briefdescription.para: the mode of the program. It is initialized to the automatic mode, the general state CSV files are first used.
the EG counter to test the EG change from the MN to the CN
the number of values coming out of each CNs
the number of values coming into each CNs
the LAN card mac address
Pointer to GsOff flag (determines that OpenPOWERLINK stack is down)
The OpenPOWERLINK process data handler counter. Counts the number of OpenPOWERLINK cycles.
the TPDO process variables (coming into the MN)
the RPDO process variables (coming out of the MN)
array of incoming values from the CNs
array of values coming out of the MN
array of value activation coming out of the CN true if activated, false otherwise
function getter of the values coming from the CNs namely, the board states, valve values and sensor values of every connected CNs.

simplesect.para: the array of the CNs incoming values

briefdescription.para: function setter of the values coming out of the MN namely, the general state order and valve values in manual mode to the CNs.

parameterdescription.para: the location in the PI_IN structure
the manual valve value to set

briefdescription.para: function setter to fill the activation array from the CSV activation file "activation.csv"
function setter of the current general state (EG)
function to display in the console the values coming from the CNs
function to display in the console the raw values coming from the CNs
function to display in the console the raw values coming out of the MN
function to display in the console the values coming out of the MN
function to cycle through some general states to test the MN and CNs programs for the early versions.
function to switch between automatic and manual modes.
function to set to 0 or 1 a valve value of a CN when mode is set to manual mode.
function to initialize the CN OpenPOWERLINK module

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOPLSystemInit when OpenPOWERLINK fails to set the correct configuration for the current operating system. or errInitFirmwareManager when the firmware manager to check dependances of the operating system fails to initialize or errSelNetInterface when the selection of the network interface fails when in a Windows machine can be caused by the absence of WinPcap. or errInitObjDictionary when the object dictionary header file (objdict.h) has incorrect values or syntax. or errOplkInit when the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails maybe because the stack is not found by the application, check the CN .lib files. or errOplkCreate when the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails to create a new instance or errOplkAllocProcessImage when the allocation of the input and/or output structure doesn't exist in the objdict.h file or errSendNMTResetCommand when the OpenPOWERLINK reset command fails or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the synchronous data application.

detaileddescription.para: The function initializes the synchronous data application

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOplkAllocProcessImage when the allocation of the input and/or output structure doesn't exist in the objdict.h file or errSetupProcessImage when the input and/or output structure are not the same with the mnobd.cdc file or noError when the function exits successfully.

memberdef.argsstring: (UINT32 cycleLen_p, const char *cdcFileName_p, const char *devName_p, const UINT8 *macAddr_p)
memberdef.name: initPowerlink

briefdescription.para: Initialize the openPOWERLINK stack.

detaileddescription.para: The function initializes the openPOWERLINK stack.

parameterdescription.para: MAC address to use for POWERLINK interface.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errSelNetInterface when the selection of the network interface fails when in a Windows machine can be caused by the absence of WinPcap. or errInitObjDictionary when the object dictionary header file (objdict.h) has incorrect values or syntax. or errOplkInit when the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails maybe because the stack is not found by the application, check the CN .lib files. or errOplkCreate when the OpenPOWERLINK stack fails to create a new instance or errOplkSetCDCFileName when the mnobd.cdc file is not found or is incorrect or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to check if the OpenPOWERLINK stack crashed or a termination signal has been received from the OS app manager.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errSystemSendTerminate if a termination signal has been received or errOplKernelStackDown if the OpenPOWERLINK stack crashed or noError when the function exits successfully.

listitem.para: It creates the sync thread which is responsible for the synchronous data application.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errSendNMTResetCommand when the OpenPOWERLINK reset command fails or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Synchronous data handler.

detaileddescription.para: The function implements the synchronous data handler.

simplesect.para: The function returns a tOplkError error code.

briefdescription.para: Initialize process image.

detaileddescription.para: The function initializes the process image of the application.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOplkAllocProcessImage when the allocation of the input and/or output structure doesn't exist in the objdict.h file or errSetupProcessImage when the input and/or output structure are not the same with what is inside the mnobd.cdc file or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: function to shutdown the OpenPOWERLINK module.

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOplkFreeProcessImage when the freeing of memory of the OpenPOWERLINK fails. or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Shutdown the synchronous data application.

detaileddescription.para: The function shuts down the synchronous data application

simplesect.para: statusErrDef that values errOplkFreeProcessImage when the freeing of memory of the OpenPOWERLINK fails. or noError when the function exits successfully.

briefdescription.para: Shutdown the demo application.

detaileddescription.para: The function shuts down the demo application.

briefdescription.para: Module to communicate with the master board using OpenPOWERLINK.

detaileddescription.para:
Mael Parot
1.2
11/04/2024
Contains all functions related to communicating with the master board using OpenPOWERLINK, transfer sensors, valves values and recieve orders from the master.
